subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Charley Hoffman and Daniel Berger had a one-stroke lead after the second round of the Franklin Templeton Shootout in Naples, Fla. Hoffman and Berger are at 20-under-par 154.
snippet: Charley Hoffman and Daniel Berger had a one-stroke lead after the second round of the Franklin Templeton Shootout in Naples, Fla. Hoffman and Berger are at 20-under-par 154.
